roleset.name: to violate a command or law
roleset.note: SIN-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from sin.01-v)

role.descr: Thing sinned against, law or command violated

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: ...text messages sealed *none* with the words: *PRO* sin and spread it.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: I will say to him : Father , I have sinned against God and have done wrong to you .
